website_summaries.verdict: Blizzard's new online, team-based game has a few MOBA-like aspects to mix things up, but it's a rock-solid first-person shooter through and through.
pros: Plenty of heroes and roles to fit different play styles
cons: Not many game modes or maps at launch

customer_reviews.title: Average game at best
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, for a game that is purely an online multiplayer it ain't terrible. Game is mostly glitch free and it looks beautiful. However; the game has no story, no single player, basically only two game modes available(with random game modes available each week but mostly just the 2 game modes), no advancement or growth, and last but not least the game modes are super simple. The game just doesn't have much to offer beyond cosmetics.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Randall Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: really fun game
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite shooting games. If you are a fan of the original Team Fortress 2 games, this is a very similar modernized version. After you buy this, everything necessary for playing the game is loaded onto your Blizzard account. The only extra things you could pay for with microtransactions is for any cosmetics, but that's totally unnecessary for the game. You can even get those for free if you play enough. Really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: Was a good price. While I don't play as often as ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a good price. While I don't play as often as I would like, the box was in good shape, the stuff that came with it was nice. The game is also very pretty and easy to get into, as long as you avoid the competitive scene which is a bunch of whiny crybabies who insist you play characters one way and only one way, because that's how you play games, formulaic and without imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful game.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game. Gives me the feeling of the Quake series I used to have as a teenager. Most like Quake 3 Arena I'd say. Just all out fun and no rage. Optimized beautifully for the huge array of PC Master Race builds out there. ;) Play on a GTX 960M on high settings and get 80-120fps or so I believe. Love this game it's such a blast.
customer_reviews.author: M and M

customer_reviews.title: Great game, but could use better support when needed.
customer_reviews.text: If you played the Beta or the free weekend, it's exactly what you'd expect. Basically a newer, better, TF2. I've got a high-end custom PC and it runs and looks very, very good. However, there were some people (myself included) that would randomly get stuttering/lag spikes. Through the support forums, it was clear that this was a Blizzard issue of some kind, but their support personnel were largely ignorant of it and rather unhelpful. In the forums, we ended up finding a fix ourselves and it now runs great again.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Overwatch has ruined my life
customer_reviews.text: Overwatch has ruined me, I have nightmares which start with justice rains from above, and its always high noon. Also I cant seem to stop pumping up the jam although I would never Nerf this. Bottom line is I will no longer have friends IRL, just ones that rarely have a mic and don't seem to understand the meaning of an objective. Best FPS since I wasted half my late teens at my friends house getting sticky-ed in Halo in my opinion. Great game.
customer_reviews.author: btphotos

customer_reviews.title: Happy Lose Track of time
customer_reviews.text: Picked up two copies for the kids. Its a great game. I actually play it quite often and I am not a gamer. Its fast but so are the game rounds which keep me playing the game. There are many differerent characters to choose from all with different skills. From Ninja skills to a chick with an Ice gun, to basic run and gun. Great game to pass the time. I highly reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Addicted_to_Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from here. When you try to activate ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy from here. When you try to activate, Blizzard's Battle.net will tell you that your key is invalid because it's already been claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: The next step for team based shooters.
customer_reviews.text: I've played this game more hours than I'd like to admit. I think I got my money's worth out of it and I'm still playing. If you were hooked on Team Fortress 2 back in 2007 and felt like it got bloated with crap around 2010-2011 like I did, do yourself a favor and upgrade to Overwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great game with decent replay value
customer_reviews.text: Great game with decent replay value. I played for a few months when it launched and still play games here and there just for fun. If you are looking for an fps with a lot of different play styles this is probably a good game to look into. As with any game try to watch some gameplay prior to purchasing. While this won't be your exact experience playing the game it will give you a better idea of the game you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: Great game, although the recent addition of characters to the original roster have made the game less fun for me. That being said, they do add new content to the game over time with free patches, and I'm sure I'll enjoy future additions, just not these first couple ones. The newly added maps are great, however.
customer_reviews.author: HonorTheSonG

customer_reviews.title: and I seriously love it. I am a big FPS player
customer_reviews.text: I've only been playing this game for a few weeks now, and I seriously love it. I am a big FPS player, mainly on console (Halo, COD, Battlefield, etc) though I do occasionally play PC and I really love the gameplay of this game. It's a breath of fresh air experiencing the movement systems, various heroes, and distinct skills and really brought my love for PC gaming back.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like team based
customer_reviews.text: Great if you like team based, objective oriented shooters. A little on the cartoony side, but fun as heck to play. There are some technical problems I have had with textures being washed out, but after some fine tuning (annoying because it doesn't give you a window to see what contrast/brightening/gamma will do in game. You have to change, enter a game, and then fiddle).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F.

customer_reviews.title: Overwatch is good with friends
customer_reviews.text: I bought this edition because I like having physical versions of Blizzard games. Nothing too special in the box, unless you play WoW/Heroes of the Storm. The game is great when you're playing with friends. Not quite good enough if you're just going to play by yourself. Good variety of heroes. I expect to see more heroes and maps in the future. The hitboxes, as of the time of this review, are pretty big and make it pretty easy to get hits. Definitely a casual shooter.
customer_reviews.author: J. Benton

customer_reviews.title: I like this game more than I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: This game is pretty sweet. I've been playing it constantly since I got it. I'll play on PS4 on occasion, but I like playing on PC more. There are plenty of heroes to choose from each with their own unique abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Zionys24

customer_reviews.title: This is a great casual game to play with friends
customer_reviews.text: This is a great casual game to play with friends. Too bad Blizzard is extremely stupid and has no idea how to balance like Dota 2's IceFrog and the Overwatch eSports scene is dogs*** and unwatchable. But nonetheless, very polished game and I would recommend playing with friends/friendly people. This game is as great as Valve's Team Fortress 2.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good Game for the most part
customer_reviews.text: The game is fun for the most part. The characters are interesting and the presentation is great. The levels objectives... kind of bland though - they could have added more objective types at launch besides hold the point and hold the trucks. Capture the Flag, Destroy Objectives, and Standard Point systems would have a been a great welcome to shake it up.
customer_reviews.author: Leinahtan

customer_reviews.title: Will it hold interest?
customer_reviews.text: Fun game play but very team based, a bad team is a bad time. Lack of modes may be an issue similar to Battlefront. Time will tell. Titanfall was lambasted for its same lack of things to do and unlock. My issue is that its incredibly hard to match make with 21 different skill levels as variables.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Code emailed quickly
customer_reviews.text: Code arrived very quickly. Purchased this for my newly boughtpc. Overwatch is a very fun game. You can choose from a few game modes and you can play coop vs ai or vs other players in a variety of game modes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Game!  A Great Alternative to COD!
customer_reviews.text: Overwatch is very unique. I bought the game around 6 months after it came out. It's 2019 now and it's still going strong! If you're interested at all in this game, buy it now. It really is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sithtiger

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience!
customer_reviews.text: Bought game as a gift, was unable to play online with it, had to return it due to inability to play. Nevertheless, overall experience was great. Return processed by ETM, nothing negative or bad to say about this seller. Willing to work with me on non-play-game issue. Would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: JD Smyth

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Think before you buy this... it tends to suck the time right out of your day because it's so much fun that I forget that time is passing IRL ;) This quickly became my new favorite game, 1-because there are so many heroes that you can try their play style to see which one fits you the best, and 2-because it was super quick to learn, but it presents a nice challenge trying to improve your skill in the ranked seasons. 6/5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Meadows

customer_reviews.title: great game nice diversity in heros good gameplay its like ...
customer_reviews.text: great game nice diversity in heros good gameplay its like an onion, it doesnt not have layers if you get me
customer_reviews.author: Neon

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Blizzard
customer_reviews.text: I've dumped so many hours into Overwatch since purchase. It's given me a new love and appreciation for First Person Shooters. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Like others, Overwatch ruined my life in greatness
customer_reviews.text: Like others, Overwatch ruined my life in greatness. I need an alarm clock noise on my phone that says either 'It's high noon..' or 'Nerf this!'. I messed up my grades in school a bit because of this. Please, moderate the time you spend on Overwatch to avoid the mistake I made. And for the love of god, please don't do Hanzo and Widowmaker on attack. We need more Winstons in this world.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pc game to date
customer_reviews.text: Overwatch is one of the greatest fps game you can find on pc. It brings something different and new form the generic military shooter. With over 22 characters to choose from and a variety of maps to chose from. Overwatch has also made it's way to compitive scene with still players battling each other all across the world to prove who is the best. And finally you can't forget sombra . So overwatch a very awesome and would recommend it to any one.
customer_reviews.author: KadenKay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game and first ever FPS from Blizzard!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this game! Fantastic Blizzard game that I was skeptical about. I am a HUGE Team Fortress 2 fan, and I've played this in the Beta and had fun, yet the characters, diversity in strategy and the maps, weapons, graphics, and sound are amazing. I could go on and on, but I HIGHLY recommend this game. Caveat: Long-time Blizzard gamer and ex-WoW junkie.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S Swiger

customer_reviews.title: It's Overwatch plus some neat additions.
customer_reviews.text: It's Overwatch with a nice box, as well as a disc, and some extras from blizzard. The box also has a registration code so the disc is mostly for aesthetic purposes, although I would think it would install if you tried it. You can check an unboxing of this to see all the extra bonuses.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: overwatch
customer_reviews.text: Much better than console versions while also being much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Cheers Love, The Calvary's Here!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fantastic game. Blizzard really hit it out of the park. It's great to play with friends, the community is fantastic, there's so many nuances to discover, and you'll never get bored with the variety of heroes and collectible unlocks for them. I highly recommend grabbing this.
customer_reviews.author: CaliReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Cant get my teenager off it. She loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Cant get my teenager off it. She loves it. Only major complaint is not being able to cross platform play with others on Xbox. She has to have two games to play with different friends and the accounts do not link. THis made loot boxes for christmas a pain.
customer_reviews.author: MJHirsch

customer_reviews.title: Great picture of the two of them playing on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was thrilled. Lots of attention to his little sister who was badly hurt in a bike accident on Mother's Day. This gave him something to distract him. Great picture of the two of them playing on the same team (different laptops) a week after it arrived. Good Times!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lantz

customer_reviews.title: As much as I had faith in the product and the people selling it, it was nothing more that a poor trick, the game was ok though.
customer_reviews.text: Well, of course, the game never came and the seller was a con. A shame really, but you know, con-men and con-women gotta eat too. On the bright side I did buy the game eventually, but it was a little too fast paced for me to even comprehend, I personally prefer Team Fortress 2. It's easier too learn, yet hard to master, and, oh yeah, it's FREE. If a free game is better than a fifty dollar one, come on Dave you're doing something seriously wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: A great game for all ages and skill levels.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use Amazon gift credits on this game while it was on sale so I got it for a steal! This is a great game for new gamers and older people alike.
customer_reviews.author: Devaughn SkillernTop Contributor: Raspberry Pi

customer_reviews.title: Great game! Fast paced action
customer_reviews.text: PC code works. Great game! Fast paced action, Lots of heroes to choose from with more to come. More maps to come in future as well.A friendly fast growing community. Game is optimized well and runs very smooth. Devs listen to feedback and are constantly tweaking the game. Definitely worth a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C.

customer_reviews.title: Do it
customer_reviews.text: This game is ridiculously fun. I was skeptical, as I'm not the greatest FPS player and there are only a small number of maps in the game, but I promise you, when you start playing it's an absolute blast. Their matchmaking is pretty good at pairing you with players of similar skill and you won't even notice the limited number of maps (which they're adding more of in the future!). Get the game, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Unable to play game
customer_reviews.text: I just received this game. When I entered in the code to authorize for playing, it said the code had already been used. I am unable to play, and there is no way to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Halim

customer_reviews.title: Fun FPS
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun. Plenty of character options with all sorts of abilities, some with more than others. Bastion is the bane of my existence, but there will never be 100% perfect balance on any Blizzard game.
customer_reviews.author: There Are Some Who Call Me Tim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Each of the available heroes has very different abilities, which means there are play styles for everyone to enjoy. From traditional shooter characters to one who throws bombs to characters that place turrets that damage the enemy. It is the first game of this type I have enjoyed this much!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much of a gamer, but I LOVE the character design!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter who I assumes loves it. She live streams with followers and posts about it nonstop. Score for daddy!
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Woolfork

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Game. Great customer support. Slow heroes changes (cough mercy) except for like bastion. Toxic players? Great...
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: I've been waiting for a game like this for years
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting for a game like this for years! I am a huge blizzard fan but was a bit skeptical at first when they decided to get into the fps game but they nailed it with overwatch! Hours of fun, cant stop playing!
customer_reviews.author: JMelo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The code I purchased on Prime Day (July 11th) was claimed two months ago according to Blizzard support. The game is absolutely amazing - this is a review for the "online game code" purchase. Just buy from Blizzard for a guaranteed authentic copy.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great game as always with Blizzard!
customer_reviews.text: Love the game. Another Blizzard home run! Get ya one and... get competitive!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Game is fun
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple, game is fun. The flaws are "technical", depending on you taste of games. Its a well rounded FPS filled with a diverse cast of hero's. My issue is the amount of maps. 12 sounds like a good amount of maps, it should of been 15. Like I said, flaws are "technical". But Blizzard has said that its DLC will be free. Maps and hero's, game modes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: George F.

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome. Seriously
customer_reviews.text: If you are still reading this. You are not playing this game enough. It is awesome. Seriously, quit this browser window and start Overwatching. Because it is high noon some where in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely Noob

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Great game according to him. Everything it was touted to be.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Forever Newb
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and action packed. Plenty of heroes to learn and even after you learn them all and think you're doing pretty good someone will remind you of how bad you are!
customer_reviews.author: Yhorm The Giant

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game. Fast paced
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game. Fast paced, and you can switch characters midgame, or whenever you want. Good balancing, and nice graphics. Each character is unique, and each makes the game totally different.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Short and simple
customer_reviews.text: Good game , great visuals , comes with good perks for other Blizzard games (I didn't get the free Tracer hero for HotS , instead I got Jiana wtf) All in all it's a decent product
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Duangtavanh

customer_reviews.title: If you like speaking in your games
customer_reviews.text: If you like speaking in your games, I recommend getting a pair of gaming headphones with it. The in-game chat/communication feature is great. No need for third party chat programs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Quick install runs flawlessly in epic to high graphics on my gaming pc.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Allen

customer_reviews.title: For the hype it's not a bad game
customer_reviews.text: This game seems more hype then anything else, however the game play and graphics are decent. The only issue that I didn't like is that it is online game only, there is no single player/offline playing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Physical package for a great game.  What more can I say.
customer_reviews.text: I like it when developers/publishers sell physical PC game packages (With downloads as I don't have a disk drive). Wish more did so and with Collectors versions. Also it's a great game.
customer_reviews.author: Kanan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because it requires the fastest computer processors and graphics cards to work optimally.
customer_reviews.author: One Bad Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great for at least 20 Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for at least 20 Hours of fun, but repetitive as you'd expect from an arena shooter. TF2 for those tired of TF2, but expect much of the same.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Wooley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overwatch is an extremely fun game definitely worth the full price. Recommend you play with friends though.
customer_reviews.author: Draxon

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with the packaging itself, just some issues ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the packaging itself, just some issues with some in game features. Quick Play match making seems off as I get matched against people way above my skill level. I was a Rank 18 going against 40's and 60's. Other than that, a nive game to play if you're a casual player or with friends. The competitive mode is for the more dedicated and those hardcore collectors of game aesthetics looking to get the golden guns. Really enjoying the game so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best FPS out there, even if the community are as salty as a bag of pretzels.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say besides it's a great game to just hop on quickly and have some fun running around and shooting people. The competitive mode is great for those that want more of a challenge. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Juan L.

customer_reviews.title: The game is great, and the graphics are amazing
customer_reviews.text: The game is great, and the graphics are amazing. However, I am already seeing myself getting a bit bored of it just being a multiplayer first person shooter with no story line aspect. Without the story line game element I am not sure how long it will keep my attention.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: I got ripped off
customer_reviews.text: I got no game code with my disc, so be careful of your purchase. I may be the only one So I may be wrong
customer_reviews.author: Rion

customer_reviews.title: Possible scam?
customer_reviews.text: The code doesn't work, I've tried everything but it says it has been claimed. Honestly, I'm just disappointed and sad. I was super happy when it arrived, thinking I would get to play the game right away and instead...just buy the digital code this isn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Horizon

customer_reviews.title: I like the Amazon discount when it came out and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I play this game almost everyday because it's challenging. I like the Amazon discount when it came out and I got the $60 version for under $40.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Always quality from Blizzard
customer_reviews.text: It is a really fun and addictive game. Very similar to TF2 but takes everything that was great about that game and improves on it. I hope this game continues to grow into the esports market.
customer_reviews.author: Rulk

customer_reviews.title: Very competitive, great online with friends!
customer_reviews.text: Still can't stop playing this with my friends Great team based shooter if you love online competitive stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Blizzard does it again!
customer_reviews.text: Have just about every blizzard game, and so far I'm hooked. Overall the heroes are balanced, and no problem with servers on launch (at least on my end). Great game for a few rounds, or hours of play. Haven't lost interest, definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great game but pricey for the extra skins.
customer_reviews.text: Overwatch is a great game but in my opinion the Origins Edition is not worth an extra $20. The skins and whatnot it includes are cool but there just isn't enough to justify the price. I recommend buying it on Battle.net unless you really want the skins and box.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Southwick

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Used to play the game all the time. The community was trash but I had a lot of fun with this back when it was new in its prime. Idk how good the game is now though, haven’t played in 2 years
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: but the box made for a nice present to unwrap)
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teenage son, who has been loving every minute of the game since it came out of the box. (Technically, we just used the code for a digital download, as working optical drives are hard to come by in our house, but the box made for a nice present to unwrap). Blizzard has done a great job building for their target audience and making a game that works well for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Spelman

customer_reviews.title: What a great game. Mechanics of the game are balanced and ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great game. Mechanics of the game are balanced and easy to understand. There is a high skill ceiling and is a team based game. Whats more to love. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Paul T

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! Multiplayer with strangers
customer_reviews.text: Multiplayer with friends: GREAT! Multiplayer with strangers: Did not do.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M. Gotch

customer_reviews.title: This game is amazing. If you play and enjoy shooters you will ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing. If you play and enjoy shooters you will enjoy this game so much fun and silly at the same time. That is what makes it so great it's silly so it is hard to get mad at.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Seller does not care of items
customer_reviews.text: This item has wrinkles on the package. Who buy this from this seller
customer_reviews.author: SangHyeon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game, glad I could buy it from a trusted source like amazon and get the download code instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it's Overwatch! I originally didn't get hyped about this game until Open Beta, and ever since then, my addiction has grown.
customer_reviews.author: txzelda

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Fun, more fun in a group. Not graphic intensive. Worth it. The different modes are fun and so are the events they add ever now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Harris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Game is good, gaming community though... not so much. The servers crashes are quite frequent which gets annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Rax

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool game. The restriction to buy Summer game skins with the coins I accumulated though is however unreasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Abram Q

customer_reviews.title: One of the best FPS games out there Lots of heros to choose ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the best FPS games out there Lots of heros to choose from, what sucks is you depend on others to fill those rolls, the community is what makes this game horrid at times.
customer_reviews.author: hugo uriostegui

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Game!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games right now. If you own a gaming pc, YOU MUST OWN THIS GAME! It is so fun. Competitive, Arcade and so much more! One of the big plusses is the community. Many hours of play!
customer_reviews.author: patrice

customer_reviews.title: Good multiplayer game without much violence
customer_reviews.text: Didn't buy this for myself, but for my son. However, I did watch him play and seems like a lot of fun without blood/gore. I recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Minh Pham

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: The only game that has made me punch my desk. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun and beginner friendly. I can see a clear improvement in my ability to play the game. Very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this game
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this game. I personally do not play it, but my son is absolutely enamored by it. It's very simple for younger audience to do well, without being overly violent.
customer_reviews.author: pinkspo0n

customer_reviews.title: Once you pop you cant stop
customer_reviews.text: I love Blizzard games but this is like Team Fortress 2 on steroids.
customer_reviews.author: SatyricSaint

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Great game so far, I feel like it is it a lacking in content but it is fun to play with a few friends. I just hope they add more heroes, maps, and game modes later on.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Great game, but note all of the dlc is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great game, but note all of the dlc is tied to your account, so if you don't have the other games they are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is another great game from Blizzard. Yes I'm a fan girl, get over it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best multiplayer shooter game ever, so many peeps its crazy hard for soso gamers like me but its fun
customer_reviews.author: Random Guy

customer_reviews.title: Blizzard Did It Again
customer_reviews.text: Great game, highly pleased. Amazon got it here on the day before release to boot. Extremely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Saldanha

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this purchase, when I receive the game it was fine but once I wanted to install it, it said that it was already activated and it said that I had to re-purchase the game again.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Daniel camacho

customer_reviews.title: Great Graphics
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun. Great graphics and adjustable settings. My husband has been lost to me since I bought this! lol
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: This game is fun! Each character has its own unique ability and ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun! Each character has its own unique ability and signature moves. Beware, you might get addicted once you start playing.
customer_reviews.author: Yuuki

customer_reviews.title: Just the best game in 2016 (well until Battlefield 1 comes out)
customer_reviews.text: First off I have never even heard of this game until a YouTuber (GaLmHD) started posting clips from the closed beta he was part of. After watching every Overwatch clip he has posted, he made me want to pre-order and be in the early beta. And now since the game is out I am having a TON of FUN!!! Sure it is repetitive but when you think about it, most multiplayer-based games are.. ;) Great fun, Great buy :D
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of fun
customer_reviews.text: Eh, it's a game and it's super fun/addictive and everyone's playing it. not sure why I'm writing a review.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: GOSH I LOVE THIS GAME
customer_reviews.text: I still LOVE having physical copies of things! The product itself came packaged just fine. The game box was designed very nicely. But the game itself? Beyond expectation!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, and haven't seen him since. Guess that means he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as a gist as well. He loves it. The only problem is his laptop is a bit slow for it :( Needs a new one for Christmas I guess.
customer_reviews.author: MW3976

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because my son needed a pc controller to play this correctly and I did not order one for Christmas. Otherwise, he loves the game.
customer_reviews.author: TKnowledge

product_meta.title: Overwatch - Origins Edition - PC
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:Origins

The future is now. Are you with us? 

Clash on the battlefields of tomorrow and choose your hero from a diverse cast of soldiers, scientists, adventurers, and oddities. Bend time, defy physics, and unleash an array of extraordinary powers and weapons. Engage your enemies in iconic locations from around the globe in the ultimate team-based shooter. Take your place in Overwatch. The world needs heroes. 

Experience the extraordinary

Speed up and slow down time. Rain destruction from above in an experimental, jet-powered armor suit. Stalk your prey as a wraith-like assassin that can appear anywhere, anytime. Unleash powers such as dragonstrike, transcendence, graviton surge, and so much more. Every hero has a unique set of devastating and game-changing abilities.

Play heroes, not classes

Every hero has a unique perspective on the battlefield and a story behind how they arrived there. You are a champion of a bygone age wielding his punishing rocket hammer in the service of honor, a robotic monk committed to healing the rifts between man and machine, a genetically engineered gorilla who also happens to be a brilliant scientist, and many, many more.

Fight for the future...together

Teamwork is imperative for survival as you enter the fight with friends and comrades. Careful coordination will prove the difference between victory and defeat as your team combines the formidable powers at your disposal to devastating effect. 

Shift your perspective

Just when it seems like your team is destined to go down in defeat, switch heroes on the fly and change the course of the battle. But don't forget that your opponents can do the same. Master the game within the game as both teams shift strategies and heroes in a constant dance to gain the upper hand.

The world is your battlefield

Protect the secrets of the mysterious Temple of Anubis in Egypt, safely escort an EMP device through King's Row in London, and do battle at other key locations around the planet. Every map has its own distinct feel with unique gameplay and team-based objectives.

Unlock the Widowmaker Noire skin

Pre-purchase Overwatch and receive the special Noire skin for the deadly and ruthless Widowmaker. Clad in black and red, she stalks her prey like a venomous spider.




Origins Edition Features*

Overwatch - Hero Skins

Pay homage to the original Overwatch strike force by wearing the vintage skins Blackwatch Reyes or Strike-Commander Morrison. Explore other heroes’ origins with Overgrown Bastion, Security Chief Pharah, and even Slipstream Tracer!

Diablo III - Mercy's Wings

Slay demonic forces throughout the High Heavens and Burning Hells as you don Mercy's wings. All of Sanctuary will know of your allegiance to Overwatch!

World of Warcraft - Baby Winston Pet

Adorably cuddly and highly intellectual, the Baby Winston pet will be at your side as you fight your way through Azeroth.

Hearthstone - Card Back

Battle it out in Hearthstone with an Overwatch-themed card back fit for a hero!

StarCraft II - In-game Portraits

With brand new portraits of Tracer, Reaper, Pharah, Winston, Bastion, and Soldier: 76, you're sure to become a champion of the Koprulu Sector.

Heroes of the Storm - Tracer Hero

Jump into the Nexus with Tracer and surprise your enemies in the blink of an eye.



Product Requirements:

Pre-purchase: Overwatch is expected to release on or before 6/21/2016. Overwatch: Origins Edition items will be available on or before the release of the game. Internet connection, Battle.net application, and registration required.
